summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins One-Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser is a gentle daily 3-in-1 exfoliating facial cleanser for all skin types cleanses, exfoliates pore-clogging debris, and removes makeup for clear, refined, radiant skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently polishes away makeup, impurities + pollutionLeaves skin soft, smooth, hydrated + refinedHelps clear clogged pores + revive radianceKey IngredientsGentle Complex [Organic Golden Gentian* + Organic Lemon Balm Extracts*]: soothes + softensOrganic Kiwi Extract*: energizes to boost skin's radianceOrganic Soapwort Extracts*: gentle foam removes all traces of dirt + grime for a clean, balanced, clear complexionMoringa Seed Extract: purifies + refines while preserving skin's natural moisture balancePlant-Based Microbeads: gently exfoliate and clear impurities for a fresh, clean complexion*Organic ingredients are produced in accordance with European regulation (CE 2018/848).Research Results99% skin is clean and clear*98% skin is soft*98% exfoliating grains are soft**Consumer test - 103 women - after one use – tested for 14 daysItem 2620948How To UseApply a dime-size amount over damp face and neck and work into a lather. Avoid eye area.Gently massage over skin using circular motions, moving from the center of your face, outward.Rinse with warm water and follow with the Clarins Toning Lotion for your skin type.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Propanediol, Acrylates Copolymer, Cellulose, Coco-Glucoside, Citric Acid, Phenoxyisopropanol, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Laurate, Xanthan Gum, Parfum/Fragrance, Jojoba Esters, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium Edta, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Saponaria Officinalis Leaf Extract, Gentiana Lutea Extract, Ci 77492/Iron Oxides, Potassium Sorbate, Talc, Ci 73360/Red 30, Maltodextrin, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, [V3916A].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a dime-size amount over damp face and neck and work into a lather. Avoid eye area.Gently massage over skin using circular motions, moving from the center of your face, outward.Rinse with warm water and follow with the Clarins Toning Lotion for your skin type.

reviews.headline: Very gentle on skin
reviews.comments: I loved the product very gentle on skin. I use it every other day and leaves my skin very smooth.

reviews.headline: I would purchase again
reviews.comments: Yes, definitely purchase again

reviews.headline: Horrible smell
reviews.comments: I'm surprised how many positive reviews this has…  personally I cannot handle the smell of it - and I typically always enjoy fragrance in my skin care!  However the smell of this actually makes me nauseous when i use it!  Very very strong plastic and fake cheese (haha) smell to it   Yuck!

reviews.headline: FABULOUS CLEANSER!!
reviews.comments: I love this Clarins cleanser!  Love the citrusy scent.  So clean and refreshing!  I love it also exfoliates.  Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Clean, baby-soft skin.
reviews.comments: The Clarins One-Step Gentle Exfoliating Facial Cleanser is just made for my fragile 70-plus year-old face.  It has a mild clean scent, and is a gel-like formulation with tiny, tiny granular bits to help the exfoliating process.  Rinses easily - just don't use more than about a nickel-size amount.   Clarins products' ingredients are clean, safe, and nurturing for facial and all other body skin.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: General enough for my sensitive skin. But also deep cleans my pores.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Love it

reviews.headline: Talc
reviews.comments: It has talc

reviews.headline: Addicted
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin that seems to need constant exfoliation. Its been difficult to balance between the two, but this face wash does the job. My make up goes on so smoothly after switching to this face wash. A very small drop goes a long way too, so this bottle is a great price for how long its going to last.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments:
I received this as gratis for my honest review. I love CLARINS products! The herbals and botanical ingredients add to the efficacy of the product. It smells only slightly and leaves my skin feeling smooth
And soft. I will purchase again !

reviews.headline: NO NO NO!!
reviews.comments: Do not buy this product. I used to love it, but they have changed the ingredients. This made my skin breakout horribly and I am not prone to breakouts…ever. Don't waste your money. If I could've given it no stars, I would have.

reviews.headline: Not original formula
reviews.comments: I was so happy they brought this product back after discontinuing it for a little only to find out they changed the formula. I used to love this product but unfortunately broke me out.

reviews.headline: Good cleanser
reviews.comments: I love the way it makes my skin cleaner and smoother after using this Clarins exfoliating cleanser. I usually use it about 3-4 times a week when I wash my hair. Its smell is ok for me. I will continue to buy it in the future.

reviews.headline: Really works
reviews.comments: This product is phenomenal and actually helps with the breakouts and the dryness because my skin is very sensitive.

reviews.headline: THE WORST!!
reviews.comments: This was so disappointing! This made me break out so bad! Do not use this product at all!

reviews.headline: Not the same
reviews.comments: They changed the formula and it's not orange anymore - scented or extract- will be returning

reviews.headline: Formula has changed.
reviews.comments: Bring back the old formula! This new one is horrible. I have used this face wash for years and I am very disappointed that they changed it.

reviews.headline: My all time favorite cleanser for over 15 years!
reviews.comments: I've been using Clarins One Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser since the day that they launched it! People complaining that it's changed are wrong! It's the best! Always has been!

reviews.headline: Bring back the old formula with orange!
reviews.comments: I didnt realize the formula changed. I've been using this since 2018 and I'm upset that I now have to find a new face wash because it took months of wasting hundreds of dollars to find one I loved. Anyways, this new formula product is easily identical to clean and clear. Dries out skin and doesnt efoliate. The benefits of the last formula made my skin glow, reduced hyperpigmentation, exfoliated and softened my skin, and made the makeup process so much easier.

reviews.headline: Bring Back the Older Formula!!!
reviews.comments: I've been using this product (the former formula with Orange extract) for years now and I have been loyal and faithful to it! I am really unhappy that Clarins not only changed the formula but also made the bottles smaller.

media.headline: A Game-Changer for Smooth, Glowing Skin
media.caption: One-Step to Softer, Brighter Skin – I Love it.

media.headline: New formulation is NOT good
media.caption: Less for more + not good = never buy again

media.headline: Bottle now contains 10% less than before
media.caption: (Left) Purchased in December. (Right) Purchased in March. Same product label, but new version is reformulated and contains 10% less.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I absolutely love this exfoliator! The One-Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser has become a staple in my skincare routine. It has the perfect balance of being effective without feeling harsh on my skin. After using it, my face feels incredibly smooth, fresh, and clean.

The texture is just right—it has fine exfoliating particles that help remove dead skin and impurities without causing any irritation. I've noticed my complexion looks brighter and feels softer after each use. Plus, it has a pleasant, light scent that makes it feel like a little spa moment at home.

If you're looking for a gentle yet powerful exfoliator you can use regularly, I highly recommend this one. It really delivers results without stripping your skin. Love it!
faceoff_positive.headline: A Game-Changer for Smooth, Glowing Skin

faceoff_negative.comments: Changed formula on another favorite!  New product feels weird and the smell is off putting.  You gave no warning of the reformulation, kept same name, but now with kiwi vs orange, upped the price, and shrunk the quantity. After many years and thousands of dollars bought in products, you have managed to point me in another direction for the future. I'm very disappointed.  Another customer lost.
faceoff_negative.headline: New formulation is NOT good
